Actor.title: Actor
Actor.description: Represents an individual or entity submitting a regenerative action.

regenId.description: A unique, private ID generated from the actor's email.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the actor was first created.

Action.title: Action
Action.description: A specific regenerative action performed by an actor.

description.description: A detailed description of the action.

category.description: The category of the action (e.g., Ecological, Social).

location.description: The location where the action took place.

status.description: The verification status of the action.

Proof.title: Proof
Proof.description: A piece of evidence (like a URL or file hash) supporting an action.

url.description: The URL to the proof media.

hash.description: A SHA256 hash of the proof content for integrity.

Certificate.title: Certificate
Certificate.description: The data representing the final verified certificate for an action.

hash.description: Keccak256 hash of the certificate JSON.

anchoredAt.description: Timestamp when the certificate was generated.

Batch.title: Batch
Batch.description: Represents a weekly batch of anchored certificates.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information for admin access.

avatarUrl.description: URL for the user's avatar image.

/actors/{actorId}.description: Stores information about the individuals or groups performing actions.

/actors/{actorId}/actions/{actionId}.description: Stores the specific actions submitted by an actor.

/actors/{actorId}/actions/{actionId}/pro.description: Stores the evidence linked to a specific action.

/actors/{actorId}/actions/{actionId}/cer.description: Stores the generated certificate for a verified action.

/batches/{batchId}.description: Stores the on-chain anchor details for weekly Merkle batches.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information for each user, including admin roles.
